@kittylitterbug

I'm a different person but I'll try to explain it a little better.

Earlier today (before THIS torrent was uploaded), a torrent was posted with this same title. People downloaded it thinking it was from SecTPB, but it wasn't. It was from an anonymous uploader. The file that they downloaded from THAT torrent contained a money making password survey thing. That torrent/post was deleted from this website, leaving people saying "wtf".

A few hours later, SecTPB uploads this. Now, because it has the same title as the fake scam one that was deleted earlier, people are commenting thinking it's the same torrent, but IT'S NOT. They don't know the other one was deleted, because the fake one and this legitimate one share the same title.
